Class ConstructionSidePaneTreeFactory

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.factories.ConstructionSidePaneTreeFactory
public class ConstructionSidePaneTreeFactory extends Object
Factory that exposes a static method to create all Nodes needed to display a ClientConstructionState.
